name: tascomiAuth
developerMessage: Authentication with Tascomi API failed, have you supplied the application with the correct keys?

name: validationError
developerMessage: Validation error, check request body vs validation schema

name: optionsValidationError
developerMessage: One of the supplied options is invalid

name: updateRegistrationNotFoundError
developerMessage: The registration application reference specified could not be found for the council requested. Please check this reference is definitely associated with this council

name: getRegistrationNotFoundError
developerMessage: The registration application reference specified could not be found for the council requested. Please check this reference is definitely associated with this council

name: mongoConnectionError
developerMessage: MongoDB (Azure CosmosDB) connection failed, check credentials provided to app and status of database. Raw error:

name: localCouncilNotFound
developerMessage: The local council has not matched any records in the config database. Raw error:

name: fsaRnFetchError
developerMessage: Fetch to the FSA-RN generator service failed, check status of service and authentication. Raw error:

name: missingRequiredHeader
developerMessage: Required header missing in request. Please add and re-try request. Raw error:

name: supplierCouncilNotFound
developerMessage: The requested local-authorities must only contain authorized local authorities.

name: notifyMissingKey
developerMessage: Key for notify service missing, check credentials provided to app

name: notifyInvalidTemplate
developerMessage: Notify template ID is not valid, check credentials provided to app. Raw error:

name: notifyMissingPersonalisation
developerMessage: Notify personalisation is missing, check data sent to Notify API. Raw error:
